thread.title: replace all same scripts

comments.text: i know we have replace all same objects in an area when updating objects, i was wondering if something similiar could be done for scripts? for example a music box has 32 states
all control speed with become next in 0.2s. it would save me hours of rescripting if i could make a change and replace all like scripts. just curious.

thread.latestCommentText: all control speed with become next in 0.2s. it would save me hours of rescripting if i could make a change and replace all like scripts. just curious.
